Line1.6D03F: Lilith and Astaroth had made a deal, and we were the ones who would pay the cost.
Line13.6D03F: Everything happened exactly as Lilith wanted. We just danced to her music.
Line15.6D03F: Donan was shattered, his mind on grief, not her. Not answers.
Line17.6D03F: No one knew what Lilith was truly after, or exactly what Astaroth had promised her.
Line19.6D03F: But we needed to recover quickly...and we needed to stop chasing her phantoms.
